Reviews.Title: “a great hotel near venice”
Reviews.Author: Cita
Reviews.Content: I don't know how to start ,because we find this hotel accidentally a few years ago ,and now we go there every year in our tryps .The hotel is in DOLO near Venice ,Cesare and his family is a very good host ,the hotel has just 2 stars and I dÃ³n't know why because it is really 3 stars hotel ,has everything you need,the breakfast is great,the rooms are beautiful and clean,I recomend this hotel to everyone

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: DrVaRdz
Reviews.Content: Great staff, nice rooms and breakfast, amazing location, Dolo is a beautiful town. Near Venice (30-40 minutes by bus). Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “A great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Thampi_60
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel in June 11, 2011 for 3 days. The experience was great. The resturant owner Ceaser was very polite and pleasing. he is looking after everything. His family is running this hotel. I stayed in this hotel during the period of heavy rush in Venice. The room is not very spacious , but clean. The bath room is so big, almost same as the room. The area is very quiet and natural. A river is flowing just opposite to this hotel. The hotel owner has even offered me free drinks in the evening. His behaviour so pleasing. I Iike him. The breakfast is also good with personal attention of the owner and his brother(I think). This hotel is around 30 KMS far from Venice (Marco Polo airport) But it is easy to reach the hotel by bus. But you should catch 2 bus. Airport to Venice central and Venice central to Dolo. It is near to the Dolo busstop. The same side of the busstop and just 20 meters forward from buststop. This hotel is cheap also compared to other hotels in Venice. I will stay here again if I visit Venice in future

HotelInfo.Name: Albergo alla Campana
HotelInfo.Address: Via Mazzini, 78 | Dolo, 30031 Venice, Italy
